POST_DATA_EXPECTED.title: Invalid Request
POST_DATA_EXPECTED.detail: An attempt to perform an action was made, but no data was included in the request.

meta.explanation: This error occurs when no post data has been included in the request.

INCORRECT_ATTRIBUTE_COUNT.title: Invalid Request
INCORRECT_ATTRIBUTE_COUNT.detail: An attempt to perform an action was made, but the required number of data attrbutes is incorrect.

meta.explanation: This error occurs when the post data does not contain the number of attributes that is expected.

MISSING_KEYS.title: Invalid Request
MISSING_KEYS.detail: An attempt to perform an action was made, but the data provided is invalid.

meta.explanation: This error occurs when the specified attribute is missing from the request.
